job_title: Customer Success Manager in Fullerton, CA
pros: A wonderful place to work, with amazing co-workers, much to learn on the job, room for growth, and room for creativity. Everyone has an impact, roles are layered and play to your strengths, hybrid, meaningful, everyone is treated with respect, and the job itself is dynamic and interesting. A tech environment with a combination of the non-profit world.
